Scenes.description: Dawn mist above quiet mud houses and empty dirt streets in a small rural village.
Scenes.visual_focus: Wide shot, village at sunrise, misty atmosphere, calm and still

Scenes.description: A barefoot boy in a faded beige shirt stands alone outside a cracked clay house, holding a small cloth bag.
Scenes.visual_focus: Close-up, boy’s face and hands, soft morning light, rural setting

Scenes.description: Boy walks slowly through dusty village paths as golden morning light falls across his face.
Scenes.visual_focus: Medium shot, boy in motion, sunlight on face, empty village behind

Scenes.description: Old, dry field with cracked earth stretches endlessly under a pale, colorless sky.
Scenes.visual_focus: Wide shot, barren field, pale sky, sense of vastness and emptiness

Scenes.description: Boy kneels on hard ground, opens cloth bag, revealing a handful of simple seeds.
Scenes.visual_focus: Close-up, boy’s hands and bag, seeds in focus, earthy background

Scenes.description: Boy’s eyes reflect rising sun, filled with quiet determination and belief.
Scenes.visual_focus: Close-up, boy’s eyes, sunlight, hopeful expression

Scenes.description: Boy digs into dry soil with bare hands, dust coating his skin as the earth resists.
Scenes.visual_focus: Medium shot, boy’s hands in soil, dust, close-up on effort

Scenes.description: Boy carefully places a single seed into the ground, covering it with rough, dusty fingers.
Scenes.visual_focus: Close-up, hands planting seed, soil texture, focused action

Scenes.description: Boy lifts cracked metal pot and pours water onto the soil, earth absorbs every drop.
Scenes.visual_focus: Medium shot, boy pouring water, cracked pot, soil absorbing

Scenes.description: Dark clouds gather above the field, wind bends dry grass, air grows heavy with anticipation.
Scenes.visual_focus: Wide shot, stormy sky, dry field, wind, tense atmosphere

Scenes.description: Rain falls softly, then harder. Boy stands still in rain, eyes closed, face lifted.
Scenes.visual_focus: Medium shot, boy in rain, closed eyes, lifted face, falling rain

Scenes.description: After rain, field looks transformed—soft, dark, glistening soil under cloudy sky, alive.
Scenes.visual_focus: Wide shot, wet field, cloudy sky, glistening soil, sense of renewal

Scenes.description: Tiny green sprout breaks through wet soil, fragile and full of hope.
Scenes.visual_focus: Close-up, sprout emerging, wet soil, hopeful mood

Scenes.description: Boy sits quietly beside the small sprout at sunset, warm light surrounds them, gentle smile.
Scenes.visual_focus: Medium shot, boy and sprout, sunset, warm light, peaceful smile

Scenes.description: Days pass, skies change, seasons shift as the sprout slowly grows into a small plant.
Scenes.visual_focus: Time-lapse, sprout growing, changing sky, seasons passing

Scenes.description: Plant becomes a young tree standing firm in the field, leaves move gently in the wind.
Scenes.visual_focus: Medium shot, young tree, wind, strong and growing

Scenes.description: Villagers gather nearby, watch the growing tree with curiosity and amazement.
Scenes.visual_focus: Wide shot, villagers watching tree, rural setting, sense of wonder

Scenes.description: Children play and rest in the shade of the tree, laughter fills the air.
Scenes.visual_focus: Medium shot, children under tree, laughter, joyful atmosphere

Scenes.description: Years later, older boy stands beside tall tree at golden sunset, looks at it with pride.
Scenes.visual_focus: Medium shot, older boy and tree, sunset, proud expression

Scenes.description: Village transformed, green fields stretch across land, life returns, tall tree at center under hopeful sky.
Scenes.visual_focus: Wide shot, transformed village, green fields, tall tree, hopeful sky

Scenes.description: Boy planted a seed, transformed everything, stands beside the tree at golden sunset.
Scenes.visual_focus: Medium shot, boy and tree, sunset, sense of accomplishment and hope
